name: smart-agriculture-system
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.install: cd backend/ && npm install && cd ../frontend/ && npm install && cd ../models/CropRecommendation/ && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend/ && npm start" "cd frontend/ && npm start" "cd models/CropRecommendation/ && python ./app.py"
